profile.title: Amaɣnu n useqdac
profile.mustLogin: Ilaq ad teqqneḍ akken ad twaliḍ iɣewwaren.
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Sken azal d tsuqilt s ddu
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Tasinin ar ma ad yettwakkes s wudem awurman
profile.saveError: Anezri: ur izmir ara ad isekles iɣewwaren
profile.noPrivateKey: Ulac tasarut tusligt ɣef yibenk-a i usifeḍ.
profile.setBackupPassword: Sbadu awal uffir i weserḥed n uɣbaḍ-ik:
profile.importFailed: Ur izmir ara ad isekter tasarut (awal uffir d aɣellil neɣ afaylu yerreẓ).
profile.keysRotated: Yettwasir iwen n tsura timaynutin d tuzna n tsarut tazayezt.
profile.rotateFailed: Ur izmir ara ad isr i tsura.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Tasarut-ik tusligt ur tettffeɣ ara seg yibenk-a. Sifeḍ-d tasuki yettwaḥrez s wawal uffir akken ad t-talesḍ di yibenk-nniḍen.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Tellaḍ ɣef Free—seqdec tixtiṛin n Tafukt/Yiḍa ddaw-a. Lleq ad tgeḍ ugrade akken ad teldiḍ yisental-nniḍen.
profile.backupDesc: Rnu iɣbaḍen iweghelhen n tsura-ik, syen ales asiwed ɣer yibenkan-nniḍen akken ad tettmteḍ.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Sɣer iznan s usfus ur nettbɣi
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Sɣer ticki asnas ur yettwaẓer ara
profile.loadFailed: Ur izmir ara ad d-yessali amaɣnu
profile.unfollowFailed: Ur izmir ara ad yekkes aḍfaɛ
profile.followHint: Tqssa-nsen ad d-banen deg umgal n Iḍfawen ma snernan d Iḍfawen neɣ d Izeṭṭa (neɣ d Azayez).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Yella wayen ur yeddi ara deg tgezmi-a.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Summeḍ tṭawilin d iznan ar uṭṭun-ik neɣ imayl yettwasentnen. Tṭawilin/iznan id-yefkaḍ zemren ad beqqeḍen uṭṭun-ik n Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Fren izen neɣ taxxamt n udiwenni akken ad tebdiḍ asqerdec
chat.emptySubtitle: Azen izen akken ad tebdiḍ adiwenni.

status.postFailed: Ur izmir ara ad isuffeɣ addad
status.filesNote: Ar 5 ifuyla. Tamentilt 24 srag s lexṣas.

sidebar.errorLoading: Ur izmir ara ad d-issali imeslayen

premium.heading: Ddu ɣer Premium
premium.description: Kfay-d timahilin n uzayaz & kkes ad.

auth.headline: Izenen iγellhen, imulaɣen s tsuqilt tasridant
auth.description: Awgelhen-araɣar, tsuqilt s AI, iznan yettruḥen, d tṭawila/vidyu.

feature.privacy: Tabḍanit d tazwar. Isefka-ik, d adrimen-ik.

auth.desktopTip: Ɣef uselkim? Sken s tiliɣri-ik akken ad tawiḍ asnas.
auth.subhead: Izenen uslig, iweghelhen, d yemsuqalen—di tikelt-nni.
auth.tip: Tzemreḍ ad tesqedceḍ Chatforia di yal ibenk — neɣ sader asnas i tarmit ifazen.
auth.scanHint: Sken akken ad t-tesidreḍ asnas neɣ ad teldiḍ deg iminig-ik.

home.title: Asebter
home.subheader: Azen izen akken ad tebdiḍ adiwenni.

press.title: Tasniḍt
press.contact: I tsarut n tamedyazt, nermes-aɣ ɣer press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: I tsarut n tamedyazt, nermes-aɣ ɣer press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia d amazray aγellhen s tsuqilt tusridant d E2E, i yettwasel i yimeslayen imulaɣen d usligen deg umaḍal.
press.assetsText: Ilugan, tuggniwin, d tugniwin n ufaris (ad d-igen sya ɣer zdat).

careers.title: Imɣaren
careers.intro: Nekni d tarbaɛt tamecṭuḥt i tnebdu amazray uslig d umulaɣ. Ma teṭṭfeḍ ɣef uwgelhen, aduqqal, d UX igerrez, nebɣa ad nesleḍ-d lqenḍ-as.
careers.openRoles: Tiwuri yeldin: Tenkert (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Aferdis, Talledna.

about.title: Ɣef Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia d amazray uslig, amulaɣ s tsuqilt s awgelhen-araɣar, tsuqilt tusridant, d tṭawila/vidyu. Tamlilt-nneɣ tezmer: ad nɛawn medden ad ttwassen—s tbaḍnit, s uslig, ufrin n tutlayin.

values.access: Addukkal i yimdanen merra: Tasuqilt n 100+ n tutlayin.
values.control: Asenqed: Iznan yettruḥen d isentanen n tɣuri d afrayan.

about.howDescription: Iznan ttawgelhen ɣef yibenk-ik send ad ffɣen. Tasuqilt, iɣbaḍ, d amtawi n yibenkan ttwag tilin akken ur nɛara ara aṭas n unefhun.

advertise.title: Ssegdem s Chatforia
advertise.description: Qqaṛ ɣer yiseqdacen n udiwenni s tuddsa tifratin d tɣelsawt. Nsemhyen s udubbay deg yidisan ifazen, usponsur, d tɣerramt n wexxam. Inermisen n Premium ur walan ad.

adsense.withPubId: Ala nesfer ads s Google AdSense. Ma tebɣiḍ ad aɣ-d-tesṭeḍ ɣef Google Ads, seqdec ID n umeskar {{pubId}} syen suter i tmeɣri yettwasemman ɣef yiḥedran-a. Ssuq n usponsur yella—seqdec formuler-a.
adsense.noPubId: Ala nesfer ads s Google AdSense. Ssuq n usponsur srid yella—seqdec formuler-a ddaw-a.

advertise.noPlacements: Ulac tmeɣri yettwasbadu yakan. Rnu-ten di ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Timɣawin tazuyin d uzger deg UI n udiwenni
why.brandSafe: Imezguḍen n tazmert; asenqed n tuggma yettwasenqed
why.deals: Igemma akked neɣ s ttawila s AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Tanemmirt! Tasutre-k tella deg ubrid. Ad nemleq-ak s zzerb.
form.missingRequired: Ma ulac aɣilif, ččar isem, imayl, d yizen.
form.mailtoInfo: Teldi amsaɣ n yimayl akken ad tazneḍ tasutre…

upgrade.title: Leqqem
upgrade.subtitle: Fren aɣmis i k-iḥemmel: kkes ad s Plus, neɣ awi timahilin imeqqranen s Premium.

gettingStarted.title: Bdu tura
gettingStarted.subtitle: D amaynut deg Chatforia? Ahnig-a yezmer ad k-yesnifel i wudem akken ad tgeḍ-d asihel di kra n tesdatin.

alert.text: Amnir-a ad yessiɣ urar mi ara nsekkred timahilin timaynutin. Ma yella wayen ixuṣṣen, ini-aɣ s

section2.title: 2) Bdu asqerdec
section2.item1: Rnu DM neɣ Agraw syen azen izen amenzu.
section2.item2: Seqdec tsuqilt tasridant akken ad tesqerdec 100+ n tutlayin.
section2.item3: Ɛreḍ iznan yettruḥen d isentanen n tɣuri deg Amaɣnu → Tabaḍnit.

section3.title: 3) Rnu ugar
section3.item2Part1: Qqen ibenkan-nniḍen u sbadu iɣbaḍen iweghelhen deg

account.q: Amek ad rnuɣ neɣ ad erreɣ amiḍan-iw?
account.a: Sider asnas neɣ seqdec web, senned ɣef “Rnu amiḍan”, senqed imayl/tiliɣri. I werr, seqdec “Tettuḍ awal uffir”.

privacy.q: Ma d iznan ttawgelhen s tagaraɣar?
privacy.a: Ih. Iznan d tṭawilin ttawgelhen s tagaraɣar s lexṣas. D kečč d wid i ttwaseqdecen i zemren ad t-ɣren.

translate.a: Rmed “Tasuqilt s wudem awurman” deg Iɣewwaren → Timeẓri & Tutlayt. Deg yiwen n wid, nesqedceg deg yibenk; ma yella ur illa, nesqedceg APIs iweghelhen s yisefka iqeṛṛen.

contact.a: Nermes-aɣ ɣer support@chatforia.com. Rnu-d tuggniwin d lqem n usnas-ik.

contact.title: Nermes-aɣ
contact.errorSend: Ur izmir ara ad yazen. Ma ulac aɣilif, azen ɣer support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Tasertit-a tesnifel amek i Chatforia (“nekni”, “nek”) tteddu deg aḍfar, aseqdec, d beṭṭu n yisefka mi ara tesqedceḍ isnasen-nneɣ. Nesnulfu Chatforia akken ad nensar anekcum n yisefka i nezmir ad nwala.

infoWeCollect.title: Isfka i nezger
infoWeCollect.account: Isallen n umiḍan (amz. imayl/tiliɣri) akken ad ternuḍ syen ad tmmesteḍ amiḍan-ik.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Agbur iweghelhen (iznan/tṭawilin) d E2E; ur nezmir ara ad t-ɣreɣ.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Tadelsant/aseqdec am isefka n uɣelluy, anaw n yibenk, neɣ imzizdgen i wesnerni n tmellit.

howWeUse.title: Amek nesqedceg isefka
howWeUse.provide: Amedlay d uselken n umeẓlu (aɛḍam, tifin n spam/abus).
howWeUse.improve: Asekned n timahilin (taɣara n tsuqilt, tedrimt).

sharing.title: Beṭṭu
sharing.body: Ur nzen ara isefka udmawen. Izmer ad nebḍu kra n isefka d imessakren (am tluqna n push, imzizdgen) s yimuqarraden igerrez.

rights.title: Izerfan-ik
rights.body: Ma yella tmanadt-ik (am GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), tzemreḍ ad tsutreḍ anekcum, aseɣti, tukksa, neɣ aḥbes n kra n useqdec. Nermes: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Aḥraz n yisefka & taɣellist
retention.body: Neḥrez kan ayen ilaq i weselkim n umeẓlu u nesqedceg taɣellist n tnaṭa d tazmert. Agbur E2E ur yezmir ara ad yettwasfer.

children.title: Iẓeḍyan
children.body: Chatforia ur iḥerraz ara i yixefn uksum n 13 (neɣ akka akken ilawen n tmurt-ik).

changes.title: Isnifal
changes.body: Ad nessekri-d ilugan dagi u nesnifel azemz n “Asniles aneggaru”.

intro.body: S useqdec n Chatforia, tqebleḍ tiwtilin-a. Ma ur ttbɣiḍ ara, ur seqdec ara umeẓlu.

accounts.title: Imiḍanen
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Mudd talɣut tameɣtut u mmest iɣewwaren-ik.
accounts.itemResponsibility: D kečč i tebɣiḍ i wayen iteddu deg umiḍan-ik.

acceptableUse.title: Aseqdec ittwaqeblen
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ulac agbur uruslig, abus neɣ iɣewwaren i ttidin; ulac spam neɣ abus awurman.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Izmer ad nseḥbes/neks asqeddec ma yella yella uɣellil.

yourContent.title: Agbur-ik
yourContent.body: Tebɣiḍ yiwen n wazal ɣef ugbur-ik. T-muddeḍ-aɣ azrefen ilaqen i wammud n umeẓlu (am abrad, aḥraz, tsuqilt).

disclaimer.title: Isenɣas d tttaẓallit n uḥraz
disclaimer.body: Ameẓlu yettunefk “am akken” war ttaẓallit. S lmendad ameqqran, Chatforia ur tɛelli ara ɣef tiddi n leɛqab ur nettwasenqed ara.

changes.title: Isnifal
changes.body: Izmer ad nleqqem tiwtilin-a; aseqdec-ik ddaw isnifel yettwaselkem d aqbal.

doNotSell.title: Ur zzzen ara neɣ ur nebḍa ara isefka-iw udmawen
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ur yebḍa ara isefka udmawen. Imdanen n California zemren ɣas ad mzizlen s usuter ddaw CPRA s tqeffalt-agi.

cookies.title: Iɣewwaren n cookies
cookies.body: Chatforia yesqedceg drus n cookies (am tɣimit, taɣellist). Ur nesqedceg ara cookies n udnubal n wexxam tis kraḍ. Sefrek cookies seg iɣewwaren n iminig-ik.
